question: What is the difference between a tangible and intangible asset?

answers.A: Tangible assets can be touched physicaly and intangible assets can't be touched

answers.B: Tangible assets have more value then intangible asssets

answers.C: Your own assets are tangible and intangible assets are controlled by the bank

answers.D: Tangible assets are private and intangible assets are public
